headline: Hatteras Style Clam Chowder
name: Hatteras Style Clam Chowder
description: No cream, but a potful of clam juice in this chowder with potatoes, thyme and bacon.
recipeIngredient: 2 (16 ounce) cans minced clams, with juice

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot over medium heat, cook onion, celery and carrots in oil until they begin to soften. Stir in potatoes, clams, clam juice, thyme, pepper and bacon. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, or until potatoes are tender.
